segments.text: This scene breaks my heart a little, seeing the potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in her task, unaware of the water flooding out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle's growing, and it could ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it already; one wrong step and she'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balanced precariously on that stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts back, and I can almost see him tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face makes it worseâ€”she's counting on him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's watching; it's all happening behind the adult's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so safe and serene in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These little moments of neglect can lead to such sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies aren't worth the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR
